text: Half Moon Street is a 1986 British American erotic thriller movie directed by Bob Swain and stars Michael Caine and Sigourney Weaver. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was based on the 1984 novel Doctor Slaughter by Paul Theroux. ==Other websites== * Category:1980s erotic movies Category:1986 thriller movies Category:British movies Category:American movies
title: Half Moon Street
